title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: The FallMenu waterfall menu is displayed horizontally and supports three-level menu configuration. It is applicable to version customization and is displayed in pop-up mode.

title: Data Source
content: Set the data of the waterfall menu through data.
findIntroStr: The FallMenu waterfall menu is displayed horizontally and supports three-level menu configuration. It is applicable to version customization and is displayed in pop-up mode.

title: Customizing Left/Right Icons
content: Use the left slot to set the left switch icon to IconLeft, and use the right slot to set the right switch icon to IconRight.
findIntroStr: The FallMenu waterfall menu is displayed horizontally and supports three-level menu configuration. It is applicable to version customization and is displayed in pop-up mode.

title: Custom Content
content: The level-1 menu content is customized through the level1 slot, the level-2 menu content is customized through the level2 slot, and the level-3 menu content is customized through the level3 slot.
findIntroStr: The FallMenu waterfall menu is displayed horizontally and supports three-level menu configuration. It is applicable to version customization and is displayed in pop-up mode.
